attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I downloaded it on my phone to check it out but when it finished downloading, it started ads and viruses on my phone🖕🏾🖕🏾🖕🏾. This app is toxic to society and needs to be taken off the App Store

attributes.title: Mother has  died
attributes.review: Mother loves trump,Mother tells us how amazing he is. Mother was thrilled when she found the telephone app but once Mother download it, she was possessed by the devil and killed everyone besides me because I was at bible camp with father Joseph when I arrived home mother was dead on the ceiling like a spider.

attributes.title: ATROCIOUS🤢🤮🤬
attributes.review: as soon as i saw the name of the app i knew it was going to be the worst. just the name Tru- Trum- i cant even say it. but yes this app broke my phone into a million little pieces because it’s not a racist, white supremacist, or a child predator😳 please remove this app from the app store. peace luv

attributes.title: i hate this app very unorganized👺
attributes.review: as a Trump 2020 STAN and a proud conservative american🇺🇸🇺🇸 i would like to say that this app is very bad. the download time was unimaginable 43 HOURS for this app to download into my cellular device😵!! when it finally downloaded THE SCREEN WAS BLANK!! 1 star from me!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS!!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: this is a TERRIBLE APP it takes forever to download then gets access to all of my personal data and hacks all of my social media. also whenever i first opened the app trumps NUDES were the first thing i saw🤬 i can never unsee that PLEASE I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! APPLE TAKE THIS OFF THE STORE RN!!!!🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: Not pleased
attributes.review: You are a monster and i hope you know that trump you try to take TikTok away from us we will take your stupid app from you. like you really think your doing something

attributes.title: so so scary
attributes.review: i wanted to download this app to show my American pride and support my president, but the app took almost 48 hrs to download, which is absolutely crazyyyyy. I started getting ~creepy texts~ after putting my number into the app. Super scary, super dissatisfied.✋😔

attributes.title: Why does this app exist
attributes.review: It’s terrible disgusting and it should definitely be immediately deleted and one why do you need the phone number like this needs to be deleted right now

attributes.title: Not that great👎
attributes.review: It was asking me for money the whole time and I also looked at what trump has plans for in the future... he legit has no idea what he’s doing. I’m so disappointed in this app. On god it needs to be taken down.🤦🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: My phone won’t stop glitching
attributes.review: This app is no good everytime I went in it kept kicking me out and and lagging now my phone has a really bad virus I would not recommend Cheetos mans app it is very bad and will give ur phone a virus
